What We Do?

Our platform is built specifically to help home service businesses grow faster.

From instant lead response to automated scheduling and communication, Helio gives you the tools to convert more leads and save time—without the busywork.

More Details

Instant Lead Follow-Up

Automatically respond to new leads via text or email to boost conversions.

Online Booking & Scheduling

Let customers book online and send reminders to reduce no-shows.

2-Way Text & Email Inbox

Manage all conversations from one inbox across text, email, and social media.

Pipeline & Job Tracking

Track every lead and job from estimate to payment using drag-and-drop pipelines.

Invoices & Payment Collection

Send invoices, accept payments, and automate reminders with ease.

Review Automation

Automatically request 5-star reviews after each job to boost your Google rating.

Can I cancel my subscription?

Yes. You can cancel your plan at any time from your account dashboard—no contracts, no hidden fees.

How can I manage my account?

All account settings, billing info, and user permissions can be updated from your Admin panel. You’re in full control.

Is my customer data and payment info secure?

Yes—our platform is PCI-compliant and uses bank-grade encryption to keep your customer and payment data protected.

How long does it take to get set up?

Most customers are fully onboarded within 1–3 days. We’ll walk you through every step and offer live setup support.
